items.title: Real-time Team Collaboration
items.description: Enable multiple team members to view, create, update, and comment on tasks in real time.
acceptance_criteria: Multiple users can edit task details simultaneously without data loss
Comments on tasks appear to all team members within 2 seconds
Task status changes are reflected across all devices in real time
non_functional: System should handle at least 100 concurrent active users without performance degradation
Average response time for updates should be under 2 seconds

notes: Assumed that the core task management features (create, update, delete tasks) exist and this requirement focuses on adding collaborative, real-time capabilities.
